snippet.title: MegaSphere Trailer
snippet.description:
MegaSphere is available right now for Early Access on Steam, Itch.io and Humble Store!

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/386340/MegaSphere/
Itch.io: https://antonkudin.itch.io/megasphere
HB: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/megasphere

General info:
Play as a special ops combat unit sent to investigate why the stars around Solar System are going dark. Smart guns, robots, self-reconstructing environments, and vast AIs are rocking in this story-based post-cyberpunk action platformer adventure game of supermassive scale set in early 22nd century!

http://www.megasphere-game.com

Music by Seajeff
https://soundcloud.com/seajeff

©2018 AKGames
